channel.title: Web Services on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Web Services on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I want to publish a product at the lowest cost
item.description: Nice to meet you. It is Taro Man. I usually develop web services. -Siltrend #Introduction 彡(゜)(゜) “I want to make a service and publish it~” 彡(゜)(゜) “But, renting a rental server is a hassle**…” 彡(゜)(゜) “** Server fee ** I don’t want to pay…” Have you ever felt this way? There must be. Use the Heroku Free Plan for that. In this article, I will write about how to publish your application with Heroku’s free plan.

item.title: [Python] Learning roadmap that allows you to develop and publish services from scratch with Python
item.description: ## at first This article aims to “be able to develop services with Python from no programming experience”, We have arranged the skills to be learned as a learning roadmap. ** 2-3 hours every day (+2 hours on Saturdays and Sundays) ** If you continue, it will be completed in a minimum of 3 months. You can skip the skills you have already learned and proceed. The outline is the same for other languages such as Ruby.
